com.ibm.team.workitem.common

Interface ILinkConfigurationContext


  • public interface ILinkConfigurationContext
    An object use to retain global configuration mapping context while processing multiple links. The context is intended to optimize link resolution performance by minimizing redundant service calls during batch link resolution.

    • Method Summary

        boolean containsLinkTypeId(java.lang.String linkTypeId)
        Parameters:
        linkTypeId -
        Returns:

      • getMappedConfigurationManagementAttributeNames

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getMappedConfigurationManagementAttributeNames()
        Returns:
        a List of unique attribute names that are required to resolve global configurations for the context.

      • getConfigurationManagementUriForRelease

        java.lang.String getConfigurationManagementUriForRelease(IDeliverableHandle deliverable)
                                                  throws TeamRepositoryException
        Parameters:
        deliverable -
        Returns:
        a single GC URI associated with the passed deliverable. Return null if no GC.
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException

      • hasVersionedLinks

        boolean hasVersionedLinks()
        Returns:
        true if this context includes link types for versionable resources.

      • getConfigurationManagementUriByLinkType

        java.lang.String getConfigurationManagementUriByLinkType(java.lang.String projectAreaId,
                                                         java.lang.String workItemId,

                                                         boolean resolveInWorkItem)
                                                  throws TeamRepositoryException
        Parameters:
        projectAreaId -
        workItemId -
        linkTypeId -
        resolveInWorkItem - - when true, the configuration management link should be resolved from or validated by the settings of the work item.
        Returns:
        the global configuration URI associated with the passed work item id for the passed linkTypeId.
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException
